title: Fate
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
If fate were to offer me a chance to change,
I'd let it slide - for every broken bone would curve me towards your light

It's in that light, I found the only path that's true, the one that would lead me back to you

So no, it's not fate that gets the final call, it's our love - our will - that conquers all

For the path ahead is lit by loves own true light. It's where I choose you each day and every night

title: Flowing love
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
Her smile feels like a heartfelt delight,
And our talks flow endlessly, far beyond the horizon,
 or a dream you'd want every night

Where my love for her is like a never-ending river breathing of life,
 each turn a new memory, each ripple a new feeling, a place for us to thrive

Our connection like a bridge above waters deep and wide,
where love and time forever glide.

Our bond not confined by moments or hours,
It's a stream, not shaped by earthly powers,
It flows unyielding, carving paths unkown, a force that moves and calls its own.

In her, I've found eternity's embrace,
A love that lingers, beyond time or place.

title: RSD
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
A thought that makes me blind, of the way that she provides. In a sense I'm losing my mind.

Over things that could be, or just don't seem right. The dates we had, all just shine bright, but still there is a feeling that gives me a fright.

It's like a song that's there just plaguing my mind. Weird thoughts that burn in my head during the night.

At last we talk and all is right
You are perfect and for you I'll fight

title: Are you right?
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
A simple question on my mind,
How do I know that you are right?

Should we be opposites as the poles, 
or should it feel like a dance between our souls?

 Our love, so pure and so divine,
As if the stars themselves would just align

Your lips on mine sparkling like a firelfy, roaming freely through the sky
All of this resonates with the most perfect lie.

Love is not just simply defined, neither does it come just overnight. It's a journey you go through with open mind. To bond, feel and even fight. But in the end only time shall tell if she is right.

title: our story
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
Our story starts where our eyes would meet

A window opened for our need, a space for memories, boundless care, a place to live, to laugh and share

A smile so beautiful that between her lips I could read, her kindness, fairness and honesty exceed

In the evening light your hair softly swayed, a capturing moment forever replayed

All it took was a meeting of our eyes
A quiet spark under the infinite skies

title: It's you
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
Your smile that gets me through my day
Your laugh that made me forget and smile
Your happines that made me laugh
Our time together, that gave me happines

title: right person
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
I have seen a 1000 faces but yours is the one I remember 
100 voices but yours is the one I chose to listen too
10 personalities, but yours is the one I'd confide with
1 person, who makes me smile

title: Lovely gaze
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
When I'm with you, all my pain would just erase. 
Days left me thinking about you, leaving my mind like a maze. 

Remembered you staring at me having that lovely gaze. 
The moment I knew I would walk for you through all the flames. 

That's when I knew, I knew my heart had found its place.

title: Most Beautiful View
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
They say, earth has beautiful lakes, mountains and seas
But you are the my most beautiful view, I have admired

title: She is everything
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
You are the star that guides me through night,
You are the light that brightens my day,
You are the path that leads my way

title: What is love
author: Jasper van Dijk
content: Before I knew you, I thought I knew love. Your eyes, as the moon in the night. Smile as mesmerizing as the ocean. That's when I knew...

title: Eternal way
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
For when all seemed dark, her eyes shined bright
When it seemed like there was no way, you were my light
For even death can't stop us, I know we will reunite.

title: The feeling of the unhappend (to be written)
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
What do I see when I look at her?
How do I feel when talking to her? (Anxious? Scared?)
But the biggest regret will be not knowing what could have been

A poem about being too scared to talk to her, but also too scared of what could happen when I will never try.

title: Sided love
author: Jasper van Dijk
content:
Thoughts of you circle my mind
As if the devil placed them, to plague my mind
I dreamed of you at my side like a pillar holding me up with full might
Time passed and a realisation came to mind
Love is a shared place for two souls
Not just halves of a divided whole
A feeling where both hearts take control
But the love we had was only filled by my goal
